data.lyric:
[ti:Rare]
[ar:Selena Gomez]
[al:Rare (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Rare - Selena Gomez (赛琳娜·戈麦斯)
[00:00.60]Lyrics by：Selena Gomez/Madison Love/Brett McLaughlin/Nolan Lambroza/Simon Rosen
[00:01.21]Composed by：Selena Gomez/Madison Love/Brett McLaughlin/Nolan Lambroza/Simon Rosen
[00:01.82]Baby you've been so distant from me lately
[00:09.80]And lately don't even want to call you "baby"
[00:18.82]Saw us getting older
[00:20.66]Burning toast in the toaster
[00:22.74]My ambitions were too high
[00:27.00]Waiting up for you upstairs
[00:29.01]Why you act like I'm not there
[00:31.08]Baby right now it feels like
[00:33.73]It feels like you don't care
[00:38.11]Why don't you recognize I'm so rare
[00:43.27]Always there
[00:46.37]You don't do the same for me
[00:47.66]That's not fair
[00:51.42]I don't have it all
[00:53.50]I'm not claiming to
[00:55.24]But I know that I'm special yeah
[00:58.90]And I'll bet there's somebody else out there
[01:03.09]To tell me I'm rare to make me feel rare
[01:08.33]Baby don't make me count up all the reasons
[01:14.01]To stay with you
[01:16.42]No reason why you and I are not succeeding
[01:22.59]Uh uh
[01:25.56]Saw us getting older
[01:27.39]Burning toast in the toaster
[01:29.64]My ambitions were too high
[01:33.64]Waiting up for you upstairs
[01:35.91]Why you act like I'm not there
[01:38.07]Baby right now it feels like
[01:40.56]It feels like you don't care
[01:44.80]Why don't you recognize I'm so rare
[01:50.19]Always there
[01:53.14]You don't do the same for me
[01:54.46]That's not fair
[01:58.20]I don't have it all
[02:00.32]I'm not claiming to
[02:01.96]But I know that I'm special yeah
[02:05.64]And I'll bet there's somebody else out there
[02:09.93]To tell me I'm rare to make me feel rare yeah yeah
[02:15.60]I'm not gonna beg for you
[02:17.64]I'm not gonna let you make me cry make me cry
[02:23.90]Not getting enough from you
[02:26.12]Didn't you know I'm hard to find hard to find
[02:32.24]Saw us getting older
[02:34.21]Burning toast in the toaster
[02:36.29]My ambitions were too high
[02:40.54]Waiting up for you upstairs
[02:42.60]Why you act like I'm not there
[02:44.59]Baby right now it feels like
[02:47.32]It feels like you don't care
[02:51.58]Why don't you recognize I'm so rare
[02:56.80]I'm always there
[02:59.97]You don't do the same for me
[03:01.11]That's that's not not fair
[03:04.94]I don't have it all I don't have it all
[03:07.08]I'm not claiming to I'm not claiming to
[03:09.01]I know that I'm special yeah
[03:12.46]And I'll bet there's somebody else out there
[03:16.56]To tell me I'm rare to make me feel rare
[03:20.76]Oh yeah
[03:23.76]So rare
[03:27.89]Rare
[03:36.25]Rare
data.trans:
[ti:Rare]
[ar:Selena Gomez]
[al:Rare (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.60]//
[00:01.21]//
[00:01.82]亲爱的 最近你一直有意疏远我
[00:09.80]而我也不再亲昵的唤你“宝贝”
[00:18.82]眼睁睁看着我们愈是年岁渐长
[00:20.66]我们愈像是浑浑噩噩度日
[00:22.74]要知道我也曾野心勃勃啊
[00:27.00]我默默地在楼上等你
[00:29.01]而你为何对我熟视无睹？
[00:31.08]亲爱的 此时此刻 这感觉就像
[00:33.73]你对我已毫不在乎
[00:38.11]为何你还不明白我是如此独一无二？
[00:43.27]始终守在你身边
[00:46.37]而你却不愿守候在我左右
[00:47.66]这太不公平
[00:51.42]我不曾拥有你的全部
[00:53.50]我也不强求如此
[00:55.24]但我知道我有多与众不同
[00:58.90]我相信在这世界的某个角落会有个人
[01:03.09]告诉我有多特别 让我感觉自己无可取代
[01:08.33]亲爱的 请不要让我列举所有理由
[01:14.01]只为劝自己留在你身边
[01:16.42]你我没有理由会无疾而终
[01:22.59]//
